Introduction

Welcome to our 1st edition of Gurans Cup! Here we bring together the best teams to compete in an exciting environment. Join us as we celebrate sportsmanship and teamwork.

Rules and Regulations

Fixtures

**Subject to Change**

Day 1

Group Stage

Game Duration: 50 minutes (25 min half + 5 min halftime)
Time Field 1 Field 2 Field 3
10:00 - 10:55 Gorkhali Squad FC vs LA Gurans Red Dallas Gurkhas White vs LA Gurans Blue Sagarmatha Warriors FC vs Dallas Gurkhas Red
12:00 - 12:55 Gorkhali Squad FC vs Texas FC Red Dallas Gurkhas White vs Sunnyvale FC Sagarmatha Warriors FC vs Texas FC Blue
2:00 - 2:55 LA Gurans Red vs Texas FC Red LA Gurans Blue vs Sunnyvale FC Dallas Gurkhas Red vs Texas FC Blue

QuarterFinal

Game Duration: 50 minutes (25 min half + 5 min halftime)
Time Field 1 Field 2
4:00 - 4:55 A (Winner) vs Best Runner Up - 1A C (Winner) vs Second Best Runner Up - 1B
Time Field 3 Field 4
4:00 - 4:55 B (Winner) vs C (Runner Up) - 2A B (Runner Up) vs A (Runner Up) - 2B

Day 2

SemiFinal

Game Duration: 60 minutes (30 min half + 5 min halftime)
Time Field 1
10:30 - 11:45 (Winner of Poll 1A vs Winner of Poll 1B)
Time Field 2
10:30 - 11:45 (Winner of Poll 2A vs Winner of Poll 2B)

Final

Game Duration: 60 minutes (30 min half + 5 min halftime)
Time Field 1
2:00 - 3:05 (Winner of Poll 1 vs Winner of Poll 2)
